items.sentence: People do sometimes ask interesting questions.
Tom can't afford to buy the computer he wants.
I didn't know that Tom used to work in Boston.
We didn't find out about that until yesterday.
That was the moment that I started hating Tom.
Learning French won't be as easy as you think.
How would you feel is someone did that to you?
Running the store is becoming a burden to Tom.
My dog is sitting with me watching television.
Mary didn't know who had sent her the flowers.
